verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>
See, <WH7200> I have called <WH7121> by name <WH8034> Bezaleel <WH1212> the son <WH1121> of Uri, <WH221> the son <WH1121> of Hur, <WH2354> of the tribe <WH4294> of Judah: <WH3063>

And I have filled <WH4390> him with the spirit <WH7307> of God, <WH430> in wisdom, <WH2451> and in understanding, <WH8394> and in knowledge, <WH1847> and in all <WH3605> manner of workmanship, <WH4399>
To devise <WH2803> cunning <WH4284> works, to work <WH6213> in gold, <WH2091> and in silver, <WH3701> and in brass, <WH5178>
And in cutting <WH2799> of stones, <WH68> to set <WH4390> them, and in carving <WH2799> of timber, <WH6086> to work <WH6213> in all <WH3605> manner of workmanship. <WH4399>

And I, behold, <WH2009> I have given <WH5414> with him Aholiab, <WH171> the son <WH1121> of Ahisamach, <WH294> of the tribe <WH4294> of Dan: <WH1835> and in the hearts <WH3820> of all <WH3605> that are wise <WH2450> hearted <WH3820> I have put <WH5414> wisdom, <WH2451> that they may make <WH6213> all <WH3605> that I have commanded <WH6680> you;

The tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> and the ark <WH727> of the testimony, <WH5715> and the mercy <WH3727> seat that is thereupon, and all <WH3605> the furniture <WH3627> of the tabernacle, <WH168>
And the table <WH7979> and his furniture, <WH3627> and the pure <WH2889> candlestick <WH4501> with all <WH3605> his furniture, <WH3627> and the altar <WH4196> of incense, <WH7004>
And the altar <WH4196> of burnt <WH5930> offering with all <WH3605> his furniture, <WH3627> and the laver <WH3595> and his foot, <WH3653>

And the cloths <WH899> of service, <WH8278> and the holy <WH6944> garments <WH899> for Aaron <WH175> the priest, <WH3548> and the garments <WH899> of his sons, <WH1121> to minister in the priest's <WH3547> office,
And the anointing <WH4888> oil, <WH8081> and sweet <WH5561> incense <WH7004> for the holy <WH6944> place: according to all <WH3605> that I have commanded <WH6680> you shall they do. <WH6213>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Speak <WH1696> you also to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> Truly <WH389> my sabbaths <WH7676> you shall keep: <WH8104> for it is a sign <WH226> between <WH996> me and you throughout your generations; <WH1755> that you may know <WH3045> that I am the LORD <WH3068> that does sanctify <WH6942> you.

You shall keep <WH8104> the sabbath <WH7676> therefore; for it is holy <WH6944> to you: every one that defiles <WH2490> it shall surely be put to death: <WH4191> for whoever does <WH6213> any <WH3605> work <WH4399> therein, that soul <WH5315> shall be cut <WH3772> off from among <WH7130> his people. <WH5971>

Six <WH8337> days <WH3117> may work <WH4399> be done; <WH6213> but in the seventh <WH7637> is the sabbath <WH7676> of rest, <WH7677> holy <WH6944> to the LORD: <WH3068> whoever <WH3605> does <WH6213> any <WH3605> work <WH4399> in the sabbath <WH7676> day, <WH3117> he shall surely be put to death. <WH4191>

Why the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> shall keep <WH8104> the sabbath, <WH7676> to observe <WH6213> the sabbath <WH7676> throughout their generations, <WH1755> for a perpetual <WH5769> covenant. <WH1285>

It is a sign <WH226> between <WH996> me and the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> for ever: <WH5769> for in six <WH8337> days <WH3117> the LORD <WH3068> made <WH6213> heaven <WH8064> and earth, <WH776> and on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> he rested, <WH7673> and was refreshed. <WH5314>

And he gave <WH5414> to Moses, <WH4872> when he had made an end <WH3615> of communing <WH1696> with him on mount <WH2022> Sinai, <WH5514> two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of testimony, <WH5715> tables <WH3871> of stone, <WH68> written <WH3789> with the finger <WH676> of God. <WH430>
